title: nadasugam tharun
sahitya:
nAdasukham tarun tha guhan tiru nAmam navinriru nI manamE nidamE



anupallavi



shItala ranjita shen shollAr amuda bOdha punita sangIta vinOda



caraNam



pUndAr aNi kuzhal kAntAmaNi vaLLi bOdhaka mAtu samEtanAi tanattAm tEn
kavi kunjaradAsan cintai pUndEn navarasa pUrita dashavidha
